revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|en|wo}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} {{wikipedia}} # A [[traditional]] [[lutelike]] [[string instrument]] of [[West Africa]]. ====Alternative forms==== * {{l|en|khalam}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=aalmx|Malax|malax}} ---- ==Wolof== ===Verb=== {{head|wo|verb}} # to play the [[xalam]] ===Noun=== {{wo-noun|bi}} # A [[Wolof]] [[banjo]] ===References=== {{cite-book |author=Omar Ka |chapter= |title=Nanu DÃ©gg Wolof |publisher=National African Language Resource Center |year=2018 |page=258 |isbn=978-1-59703-017-5}}
